channel.title: *.libvirt.xz files?
channel.description:
Hi,
At https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM#Download_and_Extract the instructions recommend to download KVM-specific images and not to convert the vmdk files to qcow2 files, but I cannot find any link except to the OVA files containing the vmdk files. Are the KVM-specific downloads available anywhere?

item.title: *.libvirt.xz files?
item.dc:creator: Dennis
item.description:
Thanks for the link. I’ve now installed Whonix-Gateway on KVM. I wish I could report complete success but I’m getting an error which I’ll describe under a new topic.

Read full topic

item.title: *.libvirt.xz files?

item.description:
Thanks for bringing this to my attention I made a sticky topic about it here:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,687.0.html
